item.title: Puma+Nginx+Mariadb+Redmine
item.description: 以下均在Ubuntu 1404.2 LTS 上运行过。 redmine目录放在/home/redmine下。 1. Ruby install 基础库 sudo apt-get install git autoconf bison curl build-essential libssl-dev libyaml-dev libreadline6-dev zlib1g-dev libncurses5-dev libffi-dev libgdbm3 libgdbm-dev install rbenv mkdir /home/redmine &&
